allow: Bash(git -C /c/source/erisml-lib add pyproject.toml src/erisml/ethics/__init__.py src/erisml/ethics/moral_tensor.py tests/conftest.py tests/test_moral_tensor.py)

Bash(git -C /c/source/erisml-lib commit --no-gpg-sign -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(v3\): implement MoralTensor core data structure \(Sprint 1\)

Add multi-rank tensor support for multi-agent ethics in DEME V3:

- MoralTensor class supporting ranks 1-6 for ethical assessment
- SparseCOO class for memory-efficient sparse tensor storage
- 9 ethical dimensions from "Nine Dimensions" paper \(3x3 matrix\)
- Backward compatibility with MoralVector \(rank-1 conversion\)
- Tensor operations: slice, reduce, arithmetic, dominance, distance
- Veto tracking with coordinate-aware locations
- JSON-compatible serialization \(to_dict/from_dict\)

Includes 54 new unit tests and 7 test fixtures.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C /c/source/erisml-lib add src/erisml/ethics/moral_tensor.py src/erisml/ethics/__init__.py tests/test_moral_tensor.py tests/conftest.py)
Bash(git -C C:/source/erisml-lib add src/erisml/ethics/facts_v3.py src/erisml/ethics/__init__.py src/erisml/ethics/domain/interfaces.py tests/test_facts_v3.py)

Bash(git -C C:/source/erisml-lib commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(v3\): implement EthicalFactsV3 with per-party tracking \(Sprint 4\)

Add per-party distributional ethics tracking to EthicalFacts:

- facts_v3.py: New V3 fact dataclasses with per-party breakdowns
  - PartyConsequences, PartyRights, PartyJustice, PartyAutonomy,
    PartyPrivacy, PartySocietal, PartyVirtue, PartyProcedural
  - ConsequencesV3, RightsAndDutiesV3, JusticeAndFairnessV3, etc.
  - EthicalFactsV3 container with party_labels and party_metadata
  - Gini coefficient computation for distributional metrics
  - to_moral_tensor\(\) for rank-2 \(9,n\) tensor conversion
  - V2↔V3 conversion: promote_facts_v2_to_v3, collapse_facts_v3_to_v2

- domain/interfaces.py: V3 builder protocol and adapter
  - EthicalFactsBuilderV3 protocol with parties parameter
  - V2ToV3FactsAdapter for using V2 builders with V3 interface
  - build_facts_for_options_v3 helper function

- __init__.py: Export all V3 facts symbols

- test_facts_v3.py: Comprehensive test suite \(48 tests\)
  - Per-party tracking, Gini computation, V2↔V3 conversion
  - MoralTensor integration, domain interface tests

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
